title: Dr James Arcadi on the Incarnation and the Eucharist
description:
Dr. James Arcadi is an Assistant Professor of Biblical and Systematic Theology at Trinity Evangelical Divinity School. He has written a book about his Incarnational Model of the Eucharist which you can find here: https://www.amazon.com/Incarnational-Eucharist-Current-Issues-Theology/dp/1108425895

He is also a cohost of the Foreword Podcast from the faculty of TEDS which you can find here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMTXOvLqW5YGn44VKNR3QqQ

We discuss the details of his book and his proposal for an Incarnational Model of the Eucharist. We mention Martin Luther, John Calvin, Brett Salkeld, Fred Sanders, Ulrich Zwingli, Thomas Aquinas, Richard Cross, Thomas Cranmer, Berengar of Tours, John Wycliffe, Jan Hus, Athanasius, Cyril of Alexandria, Skylar McManus, and many others.
